WorkItem.Description:
On page 112 (section: Ajax Updates using Ajax.ActionLink) the doc states that @Ajax.ActionLink will be used, but the code sample on page 113 shows .click binding in javascript instead of the ActionLink and the ActionLink on page 114 is replaced by a standard anchor tag.  This isnt a big deal, but it is a little confusing at first.
NOTE: I'm using the page numbers as 'printed' on the page, not Foxit's paging.
